str2: Trustworthy, faithful, believing. From peitho; objectively, trustworthy; subjectively, trustful.
From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To die together with. From sun and apothnesko; to decease in company with, or, similarly to.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To live together with. From sun and zao; to continue to live in common with, i.e. Co-survive.
